guild.description:
Ask and answer questions.

Rules:

🤔 Posts must be questions. This is a community dedicated to Q&A discussion, so post titles must be in the form of a question.

⁉️ No loaded questions.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

🥾 Breaking these rules will result in posts being kicked and possibly an exile.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

post.title: i just joined ruqqus what guilds should i join?

author.bio_html:
Life • Liberty • Property

GM of +VoteWithYourWallet, +GuildOfTheDay, +FirearmClassifieds, +TradeSecrets, +Getaways, & +Tools

body:
I’m likely biased (as I am GM of these guilds) but here are some to look into:

+VoteWithYourWallet, +FirearmClassifieds, +GuildOfTheDay, +TradeSecrets, +Getaways, & +Tools.

Some others that I’m not affiliated with but are pretty cool / niche:

+Homesteading, +ProGuns, +Architecture, +HomeImprovement, +Bamboo, +LoveForLandlords, +Freebies, +Beekeeping, +Chickens, +Shroomery, +Castiron, & +Reloading to name a few.
body_html:
I’m likely biased (as I am GM of these guilds) but here are some to look into:

+VoteWithYourWallet, +FirearmClassifieds, +GuildOfTheDay, +TradeSecrets, +Getaways, & +Tools.

Some others that I’m not affiliated with but are pretty cool / niche:

+Homesteading, +ProGuns, +Architecture, +HomeImprovement, +Bamboo, +LoveForLandlords, +Freebies, +Beekeeping, +Chickens, +Shroomery, +Castiron, & +Reloading to name a few.

post.title: i just joined ruqqus what guilds should i join?

author.bio: IM SIX FOOT TWENTY MADE OF RADIATION.
author.bio_html: IM SIX FOOT TWENTY MADE OF RADIATION.

body:
All of them. Even the really bad ones. Even the ones you dont like the idea of.

That gives you the ability to have conversations with people. Dont just downvote things you dont like. Start a dialogue. Thats what ruqqus is all about. 

I go through the guilds list every few days and just click all of em. That way I don't build myself an echo chamber.
body_html:
All of them. Even the really bad ones. Even the ones you dont like the idea of.

That gives you the ability to have conversations with people. Dont just downvote things you dont like. Start a dialogue. Thats what ruqqus is all about.

I go through the guilds list every few days and just click all of em. That way I don't build myself an echo chamber.

post.title: i just joined ruqqus what guilds should i join?

author.bio: Sick of the bots here. There has to be a middle ground between can't discuss anything on a site because you'll be banned for wrongthink, and can't discuss anything on a site because every thread is a repost by bots, commented on by bots, upvoted by bots...
author.bio_html: Sick of the bots here. There has to be a middle ground between can't discuss anything on a site because you'll be banned for wrongthink, and can't discuss anything on a site because every thread is a repost by bots, commented on by bots, upvoted by bots...

body: I just stay on "all". Gives me a pretty fresh taste of everything, and if anything stands out as being too spammy or distasteful, the "Hide Guild" button has kept them at bay well enough so far.
body_html: I just stay on "all". Gives me a pretty fresh taste of everything, and if anything stands out as being too spammy or distasteful, the "Hide Guild" button has kept them at bay well enough so far.

post.title: i just joined ruqqus what guilds should i join?

body:
Lots of good guilds out there. You can join as many as you want which is great, I like it.

+Europeans

+UnitedKingdom

+London

+Tech

+Weapons

+Joggers 

+Cucks

+8Chan

+ALtRight

+Socialism

+Warships

+Aviation

+Mountains

+NYC

+artporn

+college

+MBA

+Groypers

My favourite is +PRWars about how the reddit and pr operations work

+Reddit +Redditsucks and +BestofReveddit are also tops

W E L C O M E  TO YOU!

Lots of good guilds out there. You can join as many as you want which is great, I like it.
